node.excerpt: A  Link  displays either text or an icon. It can be tapped and will run an  onTap  callback when tapped. Props Prop Type Default Notes text string "Get Started!‚Äù icon string ‚Äùnone" The name of the icon to display (see  Icon  below). type string‚Ä¶

Tapping on a  Radio  will turn it on. Radio inputs are normally used as a group in order to capture a mutually-exclusive choice, as is done in the  RadioGroup  component. Props Prop Type Default Notes value boolean false Whether the Radio is checked‚Ä¶

A  RadioGroup  takes a set of options and turns them into a set of  RowItem s, each of which displays the option together with a  Radio . The RadioGroup‚Äôs value is the currently selected option. Props Prop Type Default Notes options string[] ["Paris‚Ä¶

A  RowItem  displays text on the left side and an optional component on the right side: a Checkbox, Radio, Switch or Icon. Props Prop Type Default Notes text string Row Item value boolean false The value to pass to the right component. disabled‚Ä¶

A  Segment  is a group of options, presented as buttons. Only one option may be selected at once. Props Prop Type Default Notes value string null The selected option. options string [] [] The Segment‚Äôs options. disabled boolean false validation‚Ä¶
